record.dc:title: 83MM30, 15MM30, Montgomery County, Kentucky. Camargo Mounds Site. Fired Area.
record.wpa:project_reservoir: Kentucky Adena and Woodland Mound Sites
record.wpa:narrative: An exploitory cut was made on the southwest wall of MM30. In this cut was found the pictured fired area. There was considerable concentration of charcoal, ashes, etc. Note that this fired area is below the humus as shown in profile. The picture was taken from the southwest.
